text:
All you Fixer Upper fans out there have probably all been wondering: What will Chip and Joanna Gaines do next? The answer is drop a new collection for their line at Target, Hearth & Hand with Magnolia. The newest release is their holiday collection, which includes a ton of stylish, farmhouse-inspired decorations and gifts. You'll find wreaths and ornaments aplenty, as well as some especially fun items, like a mailbox for letters to Santa and a farmhouse style play kitchen that rivals the real thing.

Already obsessed? Don't worry—you don't have to wait to shop. The Hearth & Hand holiday collection officially dropped today (Nov. 1), so you can go ahead and deck out your home for the holidays, modern farmhouse style. See some top picks below, and check out the full collection at Target.
authors: Brittney Morgan Is House Beautiful'S Associate Market Editor
A Virgo With A Penchant For Crafts
Buying Way Too Many Throw Pillows.
